entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dorion

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
